soot.jimple.infoflow.methodSummary.generator

Class GapManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.jimple.infoflow.methodSummary.generator.GapManager

  • public class GapManager
extends Object
    Class that manages the creation of gaps during the taint propagation and the summary generation
    Author:
    Steven Arzt

    • Method Detail

      • getOrCreateGapForCall

        public GapDefinition getOrCreateGapForCall(MethodSummaries flows,
                                           soot.jimple.Stmt gapCall)
        Gets the data object of the given call into a gap method. If no gap definition exists, a new one is created.
        Parameters:
        flows - The flow set in which to register the gap
        gapCall - The gap to be called
        Returns:
        The data object of the given gap call. If this call site has already been processed, the old object is returned. Otherwise, a new object is generated.

      • getGapForCall

        public GapDefinition getGapForCall(soot.jimple.Stmt gapCall)
        Gets the data object of the given call into a gap method
        Parameters:
        gapCall - The gap to be called
        Returns:
        The data object of the given gap call if it exists, otherwise null

      • isLocalReferencedInGap

        public boolean isLocalReferencedInGap(soot.Local local)
        Gets whether the given local is referenced in any gap. This can either be as a parameter, a base object, or a return value
        Parameters:
        local - The local to check
        Returns:
        True if the given local is referenced in at least one gap, otherwise false

      • getGapDefinitionsForLocalUse

        public Set<GapDefinition> getGapDefinitionsForLocalUse(soot.Local local)
        Gets the gap definitions that references the given local as parameters or base objects
        Parameters:
        local - The local for which to find the gap references
        Returns:
        The gaps that reference the given local

      • getGapDefinitionsForLocalDef

        public Set<GapDefinition> getGapDefinitionsForLocalDef(soot.Local local)
        Gets the gap definitions that references the given local as return value.
        Parameters:
        local - The local for which to find the gap references
        Returns:
        The gaps that reference the given local

      • needsGapConstruction

        public boolean needsGapConstruction(soot.jimple.Stmt stmt,
                                    soot.jimple.infoflow.data.Abstraction abs,
                                    soot.jimple.infoflow.solver.cfg.IInfoflowCFG icfg)
        Checks whether we need to produce a gap for the given method call
        Parameters:
        stmt - The call statement
        abs - The abstraction that reaches the given call
        icfg - The interprocedural control flow graph
        Returns:
        True if we need to create a gap, otherwise false
